org.xchain.framework.jxpath

Class NamespaceResolvingFunctionLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.jxpath.FunctionLibrary
      • org.xchain.framework.jxpath.NamespaceResolvingFunctionLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.jxpath.Functions

    public class NamespaceResolvingFunctionLibrary
extends org.apache.commons.jxpath.FunctionLibrary
    This function library was added to provide namespace prefix lookup for Functions classes. The standard reference implementation of JXPath does not resolve the namespace prefix before looking up a function.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, John Trimble
